title: *** NEW 1 Bed in Midtown East- dishwasher, laundry, doormam and +
posting_body: ['NO Short Term Allowed-', 'This newly renovated one bedroom is perfect.', 'The living space is great for entertaining guests.', 'The kitchen has an abundance of counter space, custom-finished cabinets, and beautiful appliances.', 'The bedroom can comfortably fit a queen sized bed, dresser, and more.', 'The bathroom also has been recently renovated, with brand new fixtures and vanity, while having a beautiful marble tiling throughout.', 'Though technically located on the East Side of Manhattan, Murray Hill feels centrally located to the rest of the city, thanks to the accessibility afforded by Grand Central Station.', "In keeping with the pace of Manhattan’s midtown, it's common to see office workers looking for the next great lunch spot bustling around Murray Hill throughout the day but during the evening its residential areas take on a quiet, tranquil vibe.", 'Comfortably situated on the East River.', 'Murray Hill is the perfect home for those looking to be close to the action of midtown while still enjoying peace and quiet']
